nodes.text: Eufornis Minor, sometimes referred to as simply Eufornis, was a planet located in the Outer Rim Territories. A remote colony, it was sometimes confused with Eufornis Major, a prestigious city-planet located within the Core Worlds. Eufornis Minor was the homeworld of Nazhros Oleg, an Imperial cadet.
Eufornis Minor was first mentioned in the 2015 junior novel Servants of the Empire: Rebel in the Ranks, the second installment in the Servants of the Empire series written by Jason Fry.
